original_text: You also took the fine jewelry I gave you, the jewelry made of my gold and silver, and you made for yourself male idols and engaged in prostitution with them.
korean_text: 네가 또 내가 준 금, 은 장식품으로 너를 위하여 남자 우상을 만들어 행음하며

sentences.original_text: You also took the fine jewelry I gave you
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 내가 준 값진 보석도 가져갔고

sentences.original_text: the jewelry made of my gold and silver
and you made for yourself male idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너를 위해 남자 우상들을 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: and engaged in prostitution with them
